response.original_title: Capoeira Documentary: Mestre Xuxo - Enjoy Yourself
response.overview: Mestre Xuxo ("Mestre" means "Master") is the world-known Master of Capoeira (Brazilian martial art). Every year Mestre Xuxo has "Enjoy Yourself" event, where he invites capoeiristas of all levels and groups to Lins, Austria. This is a documentary video features interviews with world-known capoeira masters, acrobatics, action and fighting scenes with art cinematography view. Also on video: Mestre Camaleao, Mestre Gil, Mestre Irineu, Contra-Mestre Primo, Contra-Mestre Cabeca, Contra-Mestre Marcelo, Professor Fuba and others.
response.title: Capoeira Documentary: Mestre Xuxo - Enjoy Yourself
